data.name: Holy Whore Emily
data.detailed_description:
üíòCHECK THIS OUT!üíò

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1571820/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1778330/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1870310/


About the Game

‚óÜFeatured Systems

‚óáFull CG mode can be turned on in the environment setting, and HCG can be freely browsed.
‚óáPressure-Free Operation Support one-click mouse operation-Fast text-to-text system

‚óÜStory

The first article of the doctrine of the Holy Goddess goes: ‚ÄúMaking love should be sacred no matter when, where, or with whom".
To make love is exciting and joyful, and to become a priesthood holder who can keep making love is even more worshiped by the world. Emily loves this kind of life.
However, when the holy temple encounters an unknown catastrophe, she must endure the hardship and solve the mystery as a priesthood holder in order to go to the bright future guided by the Holy Goddess ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶

‚óÜGame Method

The game puts an emphasis on interaction and cultivation. In the game, players will play the role of the High Priestess of the Holy Goddess Church and become the Holy Maiden "Emily" for various activities and H-acts.
The decision you make in the game will determine the direction of the plot, and the interaction with Emily will also affect the intimate relationship between the two, with a variety of rich game plots waiting for you to explore.
The game has multiple endings, which will trigger the sex plot under different conditions, and there are also many "accidental" endings waiting for players to find out.

‚óÜGame Features

‚óá29 CGs, with 150 differences

‚óáIntimate interaction with Emily.
‚óáHighly free cultivation events.

Emily loves this kind of life‚Ä¶ You will play the role of the High Priestess and arrange for the Holy Maiden Emily to be engaged with various activities and H-acts.
data.supported_languages: Traditional Chinese, English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Non-Consensual Sex, Explicit Sexual Acts, Incest sex. All characters are over 20 years old.
